title: How to Make Oven Roasted Nectarines

steps.headline: Cut the nectarines into halves and remove the stones.
Layer in a glass baking dish.
Sprinkle brown sugar over the tops of the halves.
Bake for 25 - 30 minutes.
steps.description: They are cooked when they shrivel slightly and turn a golden brown.

text: Preheat the oven to 200ºC.  Cut the nectarines into halves and remove the stones.  Layer in a glass baking dish. Drizzle with macadamia oil. Sprinkle brown sugar over the tops of the halves.  Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. They are cooked when they shrivel slightly and turn a golden brown. Finished.
